title: Did J.K. Rowling confirm her position against transsexual women?
subtitle: An intellectually motivated and widely shared article that made a series of allegations against Harry Potter's manufacturer in June 2019. Six months later, the author broke her clear silence on the passing cases.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In June 2019, J.K. Rawling categorically affirmed her indifference towards transsexual women and/or her opposition to transsexual integration.
